text: Chrystelle Lee Trump Bond (January 1, 1938 – May 6, 2020) was an American dancer, choreographer, dance historian and writer. Bond was the founding chair of the dance department at Goucher College. She was the co-founder and director of Chorégraphie Antique. Bond was a dance critic for The Baltimore Sun. Bond was born in Manchester, Maryland. Bond died on May 6, 2020 in Towson, Maryland at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American dancers Category:American choreographers Category:American historians Category:American critics Category:Writers from Maryland Category:Dance critics
title: Chrystelle Trump Bond
